Class CompanyRepresentativeView

java.lang.Object
view.BaseView
view.CompanyRepresentativeView
public class CompanyRepresentativeView extends BaseView
View class for company representative dashboard and operations. Handles all UI interactions for company representative users including managing internship listings, viewing/approving applications, and confirming placements. Extends BaseView for common functionality and follows MVC architecture.
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Method Details

    • getInternshipDetailsForFilter

      protected String getInternshipDetailsForFilter(int internshipID)
      Retrieves detailed information for a specific internship. Used by the filter menu for previewing internships.
      Specified by:
      getInternshipDetailsForFilter in class BaseView
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing internship details

    • showInitialInternshipsView

      protected void showInitialInternshipsView()
      Displays the initial view showing internships created by this company representative. Shows internships with options to view applications and toggle visibility. Provides interactive actions for managing internship listings.
      Specified by:
      showInitialInternshipsView in class BaseView

    • handleViewApplicationsForInternship

      private void handleViewApplicationsForInternship(int internshipID)
      Handles viewing and managing applications for a specific internship. Displays paginated list of applications with options to approve or confirm placement. Uses showApplicationsLoop for automatic refresh after actions.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship to view applications for

    • initializeMenuOptions

      protected Map<Integer, MenuOption> initializeMenuOptions()
      Initializes the menu options for the company representative dashboard. Creates a map of menu choices to their corresponding actions including: profile management, internship CRUD operations, application management.
      Specified by:
      initializeMenuOptions in class BaseView
      Returns:
      Map of menu option numbers to MenuOption objects

    • getDashboardTitle

      protected String getDashboardTitle()
      Gets the title for the company representative dashboard.
      Specified by:
      getDashboardTitle in class BaseView
      Returns:
      The dashboard title string

    • getProfileText

      protected String getProfileText()
      Retrieves the formatted profile text for the current company representative.
      Overrides:
      getProfileText in class BaseView
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing company representative profile information

    • editProfileFields

      protected void editProfileFields()
      Handles the profile editing workflow for company representatives. Allows editing of name, email, company name, department, and position fields. Prompts user to select fields to edit and collects new values.
      Overrides:
      editProfileFields in class BaseView

    • handleListMyInternships

      private void handleListMyInternships()
      Displays the list of internships created by this company representative. Delegates to showInitialInternshipsView for consistent display.

    • handleCreateInternship

      private void handleCreateInternship()
      Handles the creation of a new internship listing. Prompts for all required fields including title, description, level, major, dates, and number of slots. Validates input and creates internship through controller.

    • handleEditInternship

      private void handleEditInternship()
      Handles editing an existing internship listing. Displays current details and allows selective field editing. Validates changes and updates internship through controller.

    • handleEditInternshipById

      private void handleEditInternshipById(int id)
      Handles editing an internship by ID (used from table actions).
      Parameters:
      id - The internship ID to edit

    • handleDeleteInternship

      private void handleDeleteInternship()
      Handles deletion of an internship listing. Prompts for internship ID and deletes through controller.

    • handleToggleVisibility

      private void handleToggleVisibility()
      Handles toggling visibility of an approved internship. Shows list of approved internships and allows visibility toggle.

    • handleViewApplications

      private void handleViewApplications()
      Handles viewing applications for a selected internship. First displays list of internships for selection, then shows applications using showApplicationsLoop for auto-refresh after actions.

    • handleConfirmPlacement

      private void handleConfirmPlacement()
      Handles confirming a student placement for an internship. Prompts for internship ID and application ID, then confirms through controller. Marks application as successful so student can accept it.
